title: Statement by NSC Spokesperson Emily Horne on National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan’s Call National Security Advisor Suh Hoon of the Republic of Korea | The White House
content: National Security Advisor Jake Sullivan spoke by phone today with Republic of Korea National Security Advisor Suh Hoon. Mr. Sullivan stressed the Biden administration’s commitment to further strengthening the U.S.-ROK alliance. They discussed the importance of close coordination on the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, as well as on other regional and global challenges including COVID-19 and combating climate change. ###
